title: League Of Legends Client "Not Responding" Mac
body: Recently I tried to log in and the icon would not show up or note any problems. I tried some basic fixes that have worked before but nothing. Then I tried to launch it one last time and it came up with League Client cannot open because it is not responding. What do I do to fix this?

replies.body: Are you launching League from your *Applications* folder? If not, I'd recommend doing so, as launching from the Dock can cause issues.
Yes, I had it on my docks but switched to opening it on the applications folder a few weeks ago.

Gotcha, thanks for confirming that for me. Most *not responding* errors have historically been caused by certain network configurations causing your computer to have a *poor connection* to our servers. This has frequently been resolved by the steps outlined in our [**Mac Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac), so I strongly recommend trying those solutions.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
Tried the steps in the guide and it still comes up with the same thing, what do i do?

In this case, we'll need to escalate this to our tech team, where we'll be able to pinpoint the culprit of this issue much more accurately. I'd like to you first grab some system logs with our [**Hextech Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach those logs to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you ran into issues with those steps.

Im having the same issues and try restarting your mac and opening it again. whenever it is not responding you can try restarting your mac and open it again. it worked for me but i have to keep on restarting mac whenever its not responding its really a pain in A. hope Rito will fix this issue.
